partnerDetails.about: Specialist System Engineering (SSE) is a proudly South African company that was founded in South Africa in 1994. Today it is a recognised industry leader specialising in the Specific Design, Manufacturing and Installation of arguably the most powerful and reliable distributed City Wide, Area Wide, Town Wide and Network wide management and Data Acquisition systems that includes Telemetry Systems, Wireless Data Communication, SCADA as well as Business Information Systems backed by developer and management experience ranging from 15 to 30 years each.
